name: Revenge of Echinacea
description:
Game Description   

Hi, I am Yoshi.. I am a biologist from Japan. I have grown numerous plants, bugs, even animals. I built aquariums, terrariums, vivariums until today. One day I was just doing exprement. Accidently I poured chemical on my favorite echinecea! And I just thought what it can be go wrong. After all she is a plant. But I was wrong. She started to spread all over the land to eradicate it. No time to make a plan, time to be Naruto! I have to stop her before its too late. Too late for whole world...

Game Condition

Lose - Die or Enemy plant number reach 45..

Win - No win condition, collect seed as much as possible

Controls

WASD - Movment

Left Click - Attack

Space - Roll

Shift - Naruto

Assets

Animation for Player from Mixamo

Main Music from  POST PUNK x NEW WAVE TYPE INSTRUMENTAL - "pestilence" (prod. ROLVND)

Sound Effects from https://freesound.org/

Sky Asset from  AllSky Free - 10 Sky / Skybox Set

Team Members Developers

Engin Can Altınöz as Lead Developer

Enes Cihan as Second Developer

Yiğit Talay as Problem Solver Developer

Art

Environment / Mustafa Güngör

Character And UI / Fatıma Ekşioğlu
